hero.title: Teaching the <highlight>modern web</highlight> in two languages
hero.subtitle: From Nope→Web exists because learning to code shouldn't require knowing English first. We're building the bridge between Arabic-speaking beginners and the global developer community.

story.label: The Story
story.paragraph1: I started coding because someone took the time to explain things in a way that made sense. That moment of clarity, where confusion transforms into understanding, is what we're chasing.
story.paragraph2: For millions of Arabic speakers, that moment is harder to reach. Not because the concepts are too difficult, but because the resources assume English fluency. Technical documentation, tutorials, error messages, all in a language that adds an extra layer of difficulty.
story.paragraph3: From Nope→Web is our answer to this challenge. A structured, bilingual curriculum that treats Arabic and English as first-class languages. No second-rate translations. No afterthoughts. Just clear, progressive education in the language you think in.

clarity.title: Clarity Over Complexity
clarity.description: We break down complex concepts into digestible, progressive lessons. No jargon barriers.

bilingual.title: Bilingual by Design
bilingual.description: True Arabic and English support, not translations, but native educational experiences in both languages.

hero.title: Your <highlight>privacy</highlight> matters
hero.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
Welcome to Nope→Web ("we," "our," or "us"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website or use our services, and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

This privacy policy supplements other notices and privacy policies and is not intended to override them.

informationCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationCollect.content:
We may collect, use, store, and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together follows:

Identity Data: First name, last name, username or similar identifier.
Contact Data: Email address, telephone numbers.
Technical Data: IP address, browser type and version, time zone setting and location, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform.
Usage Data: Information about how you use our website, products, and services.
Educational Data: Progress through courses, lesson completion status, quiz scores, and learning preferences.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content:
We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:

To provide and maintain our services: Including monitoring the usage of our platform, managing your account, and providing customer support.
To improve our platform: Understanding how users interact with our services helps us enhance the learning experience.
To communicate with you: Sending important updates about our services, responding to your inquiries, and providing educational content.
For legal obligations: Complying with applicable laws, regulations, and legal processes.

informationShare.title: How We Share Your Information
informationShare.content:
We may share your personal data with the following parties:

Service providers: Acting as processors who provide IT and system administration services.
Professional advisers: Including lawyers, bankers, auditors, and insurers who provide consultancy, banking, legal, insurance, and accounting services.
Legal requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid legal requests.

We require all third parties to respect the security of your personal data and to treat it in accordance with the law.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered, or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors, and other third parties who have a business need to know.

We have put in place procedures to deal with any suspected personal data breach and will notify you and any applicable regulator of a breach where we are legally required to do so.

While we strive to protect your personal data, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content:
Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to:

Request access: Obtain a copy of your personal data.
Request correction: Correct any inaccurate or incomplete data.
Request erasure: Ask us to delete your personal data.
Object to processing: Object to our processing of your personal data.
Request restriction: Request that we suspend processing your data.

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at contact@khalil.mageed.net.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal data without your consent, please contact us at contact@khalil.mageed.net. Upon verification, we will promptly delete such information from our records.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content:
We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date at the bottom of this policy.

We encourage you to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this privacy policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

Email: contact@khalil.mageed.net

We welcome your questions, comments, and concerns about privacy. We will use reasonable efforts to respond to your inquiries promptly and resolve any concerns you may have.
